<div class="ocds-header">
  <h1 class="ocds-header__title">My Knowledge System</h1>
  <div class="ocds-header__meta">
    <span>Updated: 2025-11-22</span>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="ocds-master-stats">
  <!-- Stats generated by DataviewJS below -->
  ```dataviewjs
  const capsules = dv.pages().where(p => p.type === "capsule_dashboard");
  let totalNotes = 0;
  let totalStudyMaterials = 0;

  for (let capsule of capsules) {
      const capsuleNotes = dv.pages()
          .where(p => p.source_capsules && p.source_capsules.includes(capsule.capsule_id))
          .where(p => p.type && p.type !== "dashboard" && p.type !== "capsule_dashboard" && p.type !== "master_dashboard");
      totalNotes += capsuleNotes.length;
      
      const studyMats = dv.pages()
          .where(p => p.source_capsules && p.source_capsules.includes(capsule.capsule_id))
          .where(p => ["flashcard", "quiz", "slide", "conversation"].includes(p.type));
      totalStudyMaterials += studyMats.length;
  }

  dv.paragraph(`
  <div class="ocds-stat-card">
    <div class="ocds-stat-value">${capsules.length}</div>
    <div class="ocds-stat-label">Capsules</div>
  </div>
  <div class="ocds-stat-card">
    <div class="ocds-stat-value">${totalNotes}</div>
    <div class="ocds-stat-label">Total Notes</div>
  </div>
  <div class="ocds-stat-card">
    <div class="ocds-stat-value">${totalStudyMaterials}</div>
    <div class="ocds-stat-label">Study Mats</div>
  </div>
  <div class="ocds-stat-card">
    <div class="ocds-stat-value">Active</div>
    <div class="ocds-stat-label">Status</div>
  </div>
  `);
  ```
</div>

<div class="ocds-master-grid">

<div class="ocds-master-main">

<div class="ocds-section">
  <h2>üìö Installed Capsules</h2>
  <div class="ocds-table-container">
  ```dataview
  TABLE 
    capsule_id as "ID",
    version as "Version",
    dashboard_metadata.topic as "Topic",
    dashboard_metadata.category as "Category"
  FROM ""
  WHERE type = "capsule_dashboard"
  SORT file.name ASC
  ```
  </div>
</div>

<div class="ocds-section">
  <h2>üîç Interactive Filters</h2>
  <div class="ocds-card">
    <p>Use the filters below to find specific capsules.</p>
    
    <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
      <div>
        <label class="ocds-text-sm ocds-text-muted">Class</label>
        ```meta-bind
        INPUT[text:filter_class]
        ```
      </div>
      <div>
        <label class="ocds-text-sm ocds-text-muted">Topic</label>
        ```meta-bind
        INPUT[text:filter_topic]
        ```
      </div>
      <div>
        <label class="ocds-text-sm ocds-text-muted">Category</label>
        ```meta-bind
        INPUT[text:filter_category]
        ```
      </div>
      <div>
        <label class="ocds-text-sm ocds-text-muted">Active Only</label>
        ```meta-bind
        INPUT[toggle:filter_active]
        ```
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="ocds-table-container">
    ```dataviewjs
    // Get filter values from current page frontmatter
    const current = dv.current();
    const filterClass = current.filter_class ? current.filter_class.toLowerCase() : "";
    const filterTopic = current.filter_topic ? current.filter_topic.toLowerCase() : "";
    const filterCategory = current.filter_category ? current.filter_category.toLowerCase() : "";
    const filterActive = current.filter_active;

    let pages = dv.pages('""').where(p => p.type === "capsule_dashboard");

    if (filterClass) {
      pages = pages.where(p => p.dashboard_metadata?.class && p.dashboard_metadata.class.toLowerCase().includes(filterClass));
    }
    if (filterTopic) {
      pages = pages.where(p => p.dashboard_metadata?.topic && p.dashboard_metadata.topic.toLowerCase().includes(filterTopic));
    }
    if (filterCategory) {
      pages = pages.where(p => p.dashboard_metadata?.category && p.dashboard_metadata.category.toLowerCase().includes(filterCategory));
    }
    if (filterActive) {
      pages = pages.where(p => p.dashboard_metadata?.active === true);
    }

    if (pages.length === 0) {
        dv.paragraph("No capsules match your filters.");
    } else {
        dv.table(
          ["Capsule", "ID", "Class", "Topic", "Category", "Active"],
          pages
            .sort(p => p.file.name, 'asc')
            .map(p => [
              dv.fileLink(p.file.path),
              p.capsule_id,
              p.dashboard_metadata?.class || "",
              p.dashboard_metadata?.topic || "",
              p.dashboard_metadata?.category || "",
              p.dashboard_metadata?.active ? "‚úÖ" : "‚ùå"
            ])
        );
    }
    ```
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</div> <!-- End Main -->

<div class="ocds-master-sidebar">

<div class="ocds-section">
  <h3>üóìÔ∏è Active Timelines</h3>
  <div class="ocds-table-container">
  ```dataview
  TASK
  WHERE source_capsules
    AND !completed
  SORT due ASC
  LIMIT 10
  ```
  </div>
</div>

<div class="ocds-section">
  <h3>üìà Recent Activity</h3>
  <div class="ocds-table-container">
  ```dataview
  TABLE 
    type as "Type", 
    file.mtime as "Last Updated"
  FROM ""
  WHERE file.mtime >= date(today) - dur(7 days)
    AND source_capsules
  SORT file.mtime DESC
  LIMIT 10
  ```
  </div>
</div>

</div> <!-- End Sidebar -->
